prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Brass, Piano, Organ, Strings, Bass, Guitar, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
No Drums are present in this song, but it does feature Brass, Piano, Organ, Strings, Bass, and Guitar.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Brass, Piano, Organ, Strings, Bass, and Guitar, but without the addition of Drums.

Style 3:
This piece of music is made up of Brass, Piano, Organ, Strings, Bass, and Guitar, omitting Drums.
